quests.name: Chasing The Wind
objectives: Meet Elsa on the other side of the bridge.

Gather the materials for the Wind Chimes:
  ‧ 15 Softwood
  ‧ 3 Iron Ingot
  ‧ 3 Twine
Return to the Frozen Realm and find your way back to Elsa.
Place all three Wind Chimes in different trees near Elsa.

quests.name: Welcoming Elsa
objectives: Go to the Frozen Realm and talk to Elsa
